Stringafter

public java.lang.String Stringafter(java.lang.String s,
                                    java.lang.String or,
                                    java.lang.String name)
If this tag exists, take its value.
Parameters:
or: - the String returned if the tag-value pair is not present. For example: String name=argp.Stringafter("-user","none","Supply a user name"); would be used like this: % app -user fred app: I got String >fred<
